title: "What are the techniques and benefits of using hypnosis for addiction, psychosomatic disorders, and weight loss?"
first_phrase: This text discusses the use of hypnosis as a method of treating tobacco, alcohol, and drug addiction, as well as psychosomatic disorders such as intestinal problems, asthma, hypertension, and tinnitus. The last 200 tokens describe different hypnotherapy techniques, including the Chiasson method, the relaxation technique, and the coin technique, as well as how to induce different types of hallucinations through hypnosis. The text emphasizes the importance of the patient's unconscious motivation and trust in the therapist for the success of hypnotherapy. It also includes suggestions for inducing a state of complete relaxation and calmness in the patient.

last_phrase: In conclusion, hypnosis has proven to be effective in treating various physical and emotional disorders such as asthma, hypertension, nevrosis, verrucas, shingles, impotence, premature ejaculation, and frigidity. With proper induction techniques and suggestion, patients can experience relief and permanent healing in just a few sessions. Hypnotherapy provides a safe, non-invasive, and drug-free alternative to traditional medical treatments.
